means: Institute for Public Interest Representation 公众利益代表协会

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动作均表"鼓励，激励"之意。
means: encourage ： 指提高某人情绪，增强战胜困难，实现目标的信心和勇气。
inspire ： 通常指鼓起勇气，充满信心和希望。
excite ： 主要指某人的言行或其它外界因素使他人变得兴奋或感情冲动，多用被动态。
stimulate ： 尤指人或物因外界因素而受到刺激，使人振作起来或增强做某事的信心和勇气。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"感动，打动"之意。
means: touch ： 主要用于表示怜悯或同情等场合，侧重感动。
inspire ： 指激起勇气和信心，侧重鼓励，有时含"启发灵感"之意。
move与touch可换用，但语气强一些，运用范围广些。

sentence.Network_en: Our challenge is to motivate those voters and inspire them to join our cause.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们面临的挑战是如何调动那些选民的积极性并鼓励他们加入我们的事业。

sentence.Network_en: These herbs will inspire you to try out all sorts of exotic-flavoured dishes!
sentence.Network_cn: 这些香草会激发你去品尝各种异国风味的菜肴！

sentence.Network_en: The caves cannot but inspire wonder in the beholder.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些洞穴让观者无不叹为观止。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English enspire, from Old French inspirer, from Latin inspirare 'breathe or blow into' from in- 'into' + spirare 'breathe'. The word was originally used of a divine or supernatural being, in the sense 'impart a truth or idea to someone'

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲名称：Inspire 歌手姓名：滨崎步 歌曲语言：日语 发行时间：2004-07-28 唱片公司：爱贝克思 歌曲作词：滨崎步 歌曲作曲：Tetsuya Yukumi 最新收录专辑：A SUMMER BEST 歌曲歌词日文歌词 ふさわしそうな笑颜选んで もっともらしいセリフ并べて 头んなか真っ白で 感情なくしたフリはそろそろ终わりにして そう人はひとりじゃ生きれない そんな当たり前の事とか そう爱だってなきゃ生きれない 今更身に染みてる もうこ

entry.def: If someone or something inspires you to do something new or unusual, they make you want to do it.

example.ex: These herbs will inspire you to try out all sorts of exotic-flavoured dishes!...
example.tran: 这些香草会激发你去品尝各种异国风味的菜肴！

example.ex: Our challenge is to motivate those voters and inspire them to join our cause...
example.tran: 我们面临的挑战是如何调动那些选民的积极性并鼓励他们加入我们的事业。

entry.tran: 启发;使产生灵感和热情
entry.def: If someone or something inspires you, they give you new ideas and a strong feeling of enthusiasm.

example.ex: Jimi Hendrix inspired a generation of guitarists.
example.tran: 吉米·亨德里克斯启发了整整一代吉他演奏者。

entry.tran: 作为…的为灵感来源;是…的原型
entry.def: If a book, work of art, or action is inspired by something, that thing is the source of the idea for it.

example.ex: The book was inspired by a real person, namely Tamara de Treaux.
example.tran: 那本书的灵感源于一个真实人物,即塔玛拉·德特罗。

example.ex: ...a political murder inspired by the same nationalist conflicts now wrecking the country.
example.tran: 正是由正在毁掉该国的民族主义冲突激发的一起政治谋杀

entry.tran: 激起，唤起(某种感情或反应)
entry.def: Someone or something that inspires a particular emotion or reaction in people makes them feel this emotion or reaction.

example.ex: The car's performance quickly inspires confidence.
example.tran: 该汽车的性能会很快唤起驾驶者的信心。

sentences.sentence: "The article about the artist inspired the exhibition of his recent work"

means.word_mean: 3. serve as the inciting cause of;

sentences.sentence: "She prompted me to call my relatives"

means.word_mean: 4. urge on or encourage especially by shouts;

sentences.sentence: "The lung cancer patient cannot inspire air very well"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 热心的,积极的,有抱负的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aspire[v.[to,after]渴望,追求,有志于]+ing表形容词→adj.热心的,积极的,有抱负的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
stems_affixes.word_buile: spirit精神+ed……的→adj.精神饱满的;生机勃勃的
spirit精神+ual……的→adj.精神[上]的,心灵的
conspire[v.阴谋,同谋,谋叛]+acy表名词→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
expire[v.期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡]+ation表名词→n.期满,终止
inspire[v.鼓舞,激起;使产生灵感]+ation表名词→n.灵感;鼓舞,激励
spir呼吸,精神+it名词→n.精神;志气;[n.]情绪,心情;[n.]酒精
a加强+spir呼吸,精神+e→看到希望的东西加强呼吸→渴望,追求
dis去掉+pirit=spirit精神→去掉精神→使沮丧

stems_affixes.value_cn: 期满,[期限]终止;呼气;断气,死亡
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pire=spir呼吸→有出气没进气→断气
in进入+spir呼吸,精神+e→吸气进去→引申为鼓励
per全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
trans改变,交流+spir呼吸,精神+e→互相呼吸→transpire泄漏

Sentence.sentence: But what was perhaps most astonishing about Mr Jobs was the absolute loyalty he managed to inspire in customers.
It is the city that inspires the latest book from Peter Smith.
A shattering loss of confidence inspires behavior that overwhelms the normal self-correcting mechanisms that usually prevent a recession from becoming deep and prolonged: a depression
He was inspired by the way the wares were displayed.

means.word_mean: 赋予某人灵感; 启迪

sentences.en: You inspired me by playing the piano so beautifully.
sentences.cn: 你弹奏的优美的钢琴曲激发了我的灵感。

jushi.english: The officer's courage inspired confidence in his soldiers.
jushi.chinese: 那位军官的勇气激发了士兵的信心。

jushi.english: You inspired me by playing the piano so beautifully.
